statements: CREATE TABLE Pharmaceutical_Drugs (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(50), manufacturer VARCHAR(50), price DECIMAL(10, 2), expiration_date DATE);
CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50), email VARCHAR(50), age INT, date_joined DATE);
CREATE TABLE Orders (order_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, product_id INT, quantity INT, order_date DATE);
CREATE TABLE Drugs (drug_id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), manufacturer VARCHAR(255), dosage FLOAT)
CREATE TABLE Patients (patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), age INT, gender VARCHAR(50), address VARCHAR(255)
CREATE TABLE Drugs (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), price DECIMAL(10, 2)
CREATE TABLE Manufacturers (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), location VARCHAR(255)
CREATE TABLE Sales (id INT PRIMARY KEY, drug_id INT, manufacturer_id INT, quantity INT, sale_date DATE)
CREATE TABLE pharmacy (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE employees (id INT PRIMARY KEY, first_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, last_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, pharmacy_id INT NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (pharmacy_id) REFERENCES pharmacy(id));
CREATE TABLE products (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, pharmacy_id INT NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (pharmacy_id) REFERENCES pharmacy(id));
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS manufacturers (manufacturer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS drugs (drug_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, dosage VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, manufacturer_id UUID REFERENCES manufacturers(manufacturer_id));

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS prescriptions (prescription_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, patient_id UUID NOT NULL, drug_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES drugs(drug_id), dosage VARCHAR(50), quantity INT NOT NULL, date_prescribed DATE NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS patients (patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, age INT NOT NULL, address VARCHAR(255));
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS pharmacies (pharmacy_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, phone_number VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL);
